title: Interpretation of a married woman getting married in a dream

preview.html: Find out the interpretation of a married woman getting married in a dream and what this dream means to you in reality. The wedding night is an unforgettable memory where the couple celebrates in the company of family and friends. The dream of marriage is one of the visions that indicate goodness and happiness, but the dream becomes strange if this dream is in the dream of a married woman, which carries different interpretations. We will learn this through the encyclopedia. We present to you the interpretation of Ibn Sirin about the dream of marriage. For a married woman. Interpretation of a married woman getting married in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman getting married in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If a married woman dreams that she is marrying someone she knows, then this dream means that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin interpreted a married woman’s marriage to an elderly man in a dream as a sign of That she will soon get a lot of money. If a married woman dreams that her husband is marrying her to someone she knows, then this dream means that she will get a lot of money. To dream of a married woman marrying a dead man means that she will also get a lot of money. If the woman sees For a married woman, she is getting married in a dream. This vision indicates earning money or starting a new project in reality. Seeing a married woman getting married to the ruler of the country indicates that her desire has been fulfilled in reality or that her husband will be promoted in his job. Interpretation of seeing a married woman getting married in a dream according to Nabulsi. He mentioned Al-Nabulsi said that if a married woman dreams of wearing a wedding dress and giving it to someone other than her husband, then this vision has many interpretations, and it can indicate pregnancy, promotion at work, or the success of children. Seeing a married woman getting married in a dream to someone she does not know means kindness and achieving goals in reality. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is marrying a young man she does not know who is younger than her, then this vision portends the presence of an evil friend in her life who is trying to harm her. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is marrying someone she does not know and is not happy with this marriage, then this vision appears. Something hateful to her, and it may indicate the emergence of marital problems or illness, and God knows best. The best.Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s marriage in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen interprets a pregnant woman’s marriage in a dream to someone she does not know as an indication that her husband will have the opportunity to travel abroad. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is marrying someone she knows, then this vision is a sign On the approaching date of her birth. Seeing a pregnant woman getting married again in a dream means that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. These were the most prominent interpretations of a dream about a married woman in a dream, and we must remind you, dear reader, that all of these interpretations that we mentioned in this article are only interpretations. For interpretation scholars, after all, only God knows the unseen and to interpret another dream you can download the dream interpretation application directly.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fat girl in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see an obese girl in a dream Obesity is considered the most dangerous disease of the modern age because it causes many serious diseases, the most important of which are heart disease and atherosclerosis, in addition to high blood pressure and diabetes. It also spreads among people and affects many of them as a result of lack of awareness of it and the damage it causes, as it consists of layers of accumulated fat, which harms the health of the body and greatly affects its appearance and also affects the spirit. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a fat girl in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a fat girl in a dream for a single woman. Obesity has many causes and factors, the most important of which are genetic factors, lack of proper nutrition, lack of exercise, overeating, and lack of awareness of the many risks and harms that obesity causes to the body in terms of Health. Seeing a fat girl in a dream means that her life will be full of kindness and nourishment. Seeing a fat girl indicates the bachelor’s urgent marriage and meeting her family after a long separation. To dream of a fat girl is good news for her to achieve her hopes and aspirations. The transformation of an unmarried woman into a fat girl in The dream indicates her righteousness, doing many good deeds and helping others. Seeing obesity in a dream warns her of great misfortunes in her life. See also: Ibn Sirin’s explanation of the appearance of nails in detail. Seeing an obese woman losing weight. There are many symptoms that herald obesity in a person, the most important of which is shortness of breath and difficulty Breathing when a person makes any slight effort to move and a noticeable increase in weight over a period of time, in addition to lethargy, excessive laziness. He sleeps a lot and eats a lot during the day. If you dream of a fat woman who was very thin, this means that she will be exposed to many problems and troubles. This vision also shows the woman’s shortcomings in her worship and religious affairs. Seeing an obese woman losing weight indicates that she will suffer from many diseases and seizures. It indicates Changing from fat to thin in a dream means that a woman feels financial hardship in her life. This dream symbolizes that you will be exposed to many worries and anxieties in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a fat girl for a pregnant woman: During pregnancy, a pregnant woman craves a lot of food and drink, especially when she is in Dream, her diet increases excessively and leads to her weight gain, which can be a slight increase and get rid of it. Some of them are easy after birth, and it can be an exaggeration that continues after she is born. Seeing a pregnant woman giving birth to a fat child indicates an increase in money. This dream means that the rest of the children will go to education and have a successful future. Watching the birth of a fat girl indicates an increase in nutrition and enormous wealth in The coming days. It also indicates hearing happy, cheerful and promising news in the future. In addition, the dreamer will have a high status in society, especially in his work. See also: Interpretation of a dream about reading the Qur’an in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a fat person in a dream. A person must He takes care of his health and cares about his health, especially with

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a carpet in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: The appearance of a carpet in a dream has different interpretations, and this interpretation is due to the nature of the appearance of a carpet in a dream, as the interpretation varies depending on the color of the carpet. Interpretation of a dream about a carpet by Ibn Sirin. Seeing Persian carpets in a dream means wealth and livelihood. Seeing silk carpets in a dream means security. Interpretation of a dream about a carpet for a single woman indicates A carpet in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates marriage to a generous and well-to-do man. If a girl in a dream receives a carpet as a gift, this means that she will be blessed with happy news. Seeing carpets in cheerful colors is a sign of wonderful and happy news. If you see a red carpet in a dream, this means nourishment Good. A girl receiving colorful carpets in a dream indicates that she will receive happy news. If she sees a clean carpet in a girl’s dream, this means good and happy news. Interpretation of a dream about a carpet according to Al-Nabulsi. If a person sees in a dream that he is walking on a carpet, this indicates getting rid of sadness. Whoever sees in a dream: If he buys a carpet, this indicates the purchase of a new home. Whoever sees that he is placing carpets on the floor, this indicates the status he will obtain in society. If a person sees in his dream a carpet spread out in front of him, this indicates longevity. Whoever sees in If a man sees in a dream that he is washing carpets, this indicates the happy stage that he is going through. The dreamer in his life. Whoever sees a man in a dream that he is placing the carpet in a place he does not know, this indicates marriage to a good woman. The carpet in the man’s dream is evidence of the marriage of a single person. Interpretation of a dream about a carpet for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in the dream is buying a green carpet, and this indicates that she She will get pregnant soon and give birth to a baby girl. If a woman sees that her husband is giving her a rug, she will get pregnant soon. A dream of a rug for a married woman indicates an abundance of money. Interpretation of a dream about a rug for a pregnant woman. A clean carpet in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates easy childbirth and good offspring. Buying a rug in a pregnant woman’s dream is A sign of the approaching date of birth. Add the dream you would like to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: The 50 most important interpretations of hearing zaghroda in a dream

preview.html: Zagroda in dreams Zagroda is actually one of the manifestations of joy and happiness, whose name is always associated with happy occasions, but does she have the same joy in the world of dreams? Did it predict the appearance of goodness or happiness in the life of the dreamer? All these questions and others were answered in the article that presents the interpretations of the great imams and clarifies their opinions about Zagrouda in a dream. The dreamer in his dream that he is celebrating without the wedding or other joys in sight, this indicates the presence of good things, blessings and good news that will come to him. But when a person hears buzzing during his sleep and finds a manifestation of happiness, this is a sign that the person will fall into some problems and feel sad and anxious. In the event that one of the elders of the family, such as a grandmother, throws a zaghrudah, it indicates salvation from the distress and crises that befell you in the past period. When the dreamer sees herself in a dream singing a hymn, this indicates the evil ways of this woman, her distance from God, and her bad intentions in magic. And superstitions. If the dreamer hears a lot of squawking while traveling somewhere in a dream, this is a sign of her good deeds and that she will be a woman of high esteem and standing among the people. A Zaghrouda in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a Zaghrouda in a dream with different interpretations, such as: The scholar says Ibn Sirin said that when a person sees himself in a dream uttering a trill, this indicates the presence of sadness and traps that afflict him, and he will fall into many problems. If a young man hears tinnitus in a dream, this indicates the presence of adversities in his life and his failure in many matters, and he often gets confused in his affairs and is unable to choose. It is best for him, so we advise him to return to God. And insisting on doing good and giving alms, and these actions will help him in this world and the hereafter, God willing. If the expatriate young man hears a rattle in his sleep, this is an indication that he will soon return to his homeland. In the event that the dreamer hears a lot of noise in his bedroom without any joy in the dream, then the dream It is an indication that he is about to fulfill a wish he has always wanted. When you see someone you know walking down the street and you hear a lot of people cheering, this is a clear indication that this person will travel abroad in the near future. Zagroda in a single woman’s dreamThe interpretation of a single woman’s dream of Zagroda is interpreted with indications Different and we present them to you below: When an unmarried woman hears desires in her dream and does not know their source, this is a sign that she will marry and get married soon. If the girl is in the study stage and dreams of Zagrouda and she is happy with it, this indicates her success and excellence in the educational field. But when she sees herself getting divorced Zaghrouda in a dream, this indicates that she will be exposed to problems and crises in her life. If the dreamer is single and has many quarrels with her neighbors, and she sees that she is gossiping in her house, this indicates the end of these quarrels between her and the improvement of relations. If a girl dreams that she is humming very loudly

title: What is the interpretation of the dream in which I was flying and landed in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: I dreamed that I was flying and landing, among the dreams that repeat flying in a dream and landing, and when he sees this symbol it makes the dreamer curious to know the interpretation and what it will lead to, if it is good and we bring him good news and joy or bad and make him take refuge from this vision, so we will provide through This article covers the largest number of issues related to this symbol. I dreamed that I was flying and landing. Flying and landing on Manna visions indicate many signs and symptoms that can be identified through the following cases: The dreamer who sees in a dream that he is flying and then landing is a sign of a health crisis that requires him Sleeping for a period of time. If the dreamer sees him flying in a dream and then landing, this symbolizes that he has made some wrong decisions, which he needs to rethink so as not to get into trouble. Flying in a dream and landing is a vision that indicates that the dreamer will suffer a major financial loss that will put him in trouble. A bad psychological state as a result of the accumulation of debts on him. I dreamed that I was flying and landing for the sake of Ibn Sirin, one of the most prominent translators and scholars in the world of dreams who dealt with the interpretation of flying and landing in a dream. Below are some of the opinions received about it: Flying in a dream according to Ibn Sirin indicates that the dreamer will gain status and power, If he descends, he will depart and be exposed to his loss and loss. To see yourself flying and landing in a dream indicates the difficulties and fatigue that the dreamer is suffering from and his sins that anger God, and he must approach God in search of guidance. I dreamed that I was flying and landing on an individual flight. The interpretation of seeing flying and landing in a dream varies according to the dreamer’s social status. The following is the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees this symbol: An unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she is flying and then landing shows the difficulty of reaching her dreams and aspirations despite her continuous efforts. If a girl dreams that she is flying and then lands and falls, this symbolizes her relationship with someone who is not suitable for her and her. Stay away from him. I dreamed that I was flying and landing for the sake of a married woman. A married woman who sees in her dream that she is flying and then landing is evidence of the instability of her marital life and the eruption of disputes and problems between her and her husband, which may lead to separation and she must look for shelter. From this vision. Traveling by plane and landing in a dream for a married woman indicates that she will suffer a major financial loss as a result of her participation in a failed and unprofitable project. I dreamed that I was flying and getting pregnant. One of the visions whose meaning is difficult to know in a dream about a pregnant woman is that she is flying and landing, so we will interpret this symbol. Through the following cases: A pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is flying and then landing, and this is an indication that she will be exposed to a major health crisis that will expose herself and her fetus to danger, and she must preserve and observe the doctor’s instructions. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is flying and then landing, this symbolizes the distress and distress of her life that she will suffer from in the coming period. title: What is the interpretation of seeing whole grapes eaten in a dream for a man and a woman?

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing grapes in a dream is considered one of the main books on the interpretation of dreams and visions, via the Trend website. Seeing yourself eating grapes in a dream is full of visions that indicate kindness, blessing and support for the dreamer. Therefore, we have provided you, dear followers, with everything related to knowing the interpretation of sleep about the complete consumption of grapes in a dream for an ordinary, common, married or pregnant woman, as well as for men. Why do you dream of grapes for an ordinary woman? In detail, the interpreters explained in their books to us that seeing a girl in a dream about grapes indicates many things, including her upcoming future, that she will have a happy period when he comes to her, and his appearance. It is white grapes in a dream, full, that testify that God will give her a husband, and perhaps this husband will raise her. The presence of green grapes in a woman’s dream indicates that she will marry a rich man who has a lot of money and a prominent position. But if she sees herself in a dream full and she is eating grapes Red, it means that she will marry Dora and become her husband’s second wife, and God knows best. Why does a married woman dream of grapes? Interpretations say that it is undesirable to see grapes in a wife’s dream, especially if she does not marry him. Seeing grapes in a dream indicates problems with her husband and that she is suffering from discord in her marriage. It can spoil the relationship and interfere in it, and God knows best. It also indicates that seeing black grapes in a married woman’s dream symbolizes that she is a strong person and that she is the one who controls and controls the affairs of her home, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin also said that eating red grapes in a dream indicates complete On the husband’s love for her and his trust in her. As for eating whole green grapes in a dream, this indicates goodness and life in the near future. As for her eating grapes, the white color in the dream indicates that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. Why does Ibn Sirin dream of grapes? Ibn Sirin praises that seeing Grapes in a dream are a sign of the arrival of glaucoma and compassion. Ibn Sirin says that if one sees a whole vine in a dream, this means that the dreamer is going through a difficult time, and God knows best. Why does a pregnant woman dream of grapes? They say that if a pregnant woman sees herself picking grapes, this indicates the approaching The date of her birth, and eating whole grapes in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the end of her worries and the arrival of goodness and taste for her and for God. He knows best.If you have a dream and want it interpreted, leave it in the comments below and our team will get back to you.
preview.text: The interpretation of seeing grapes in a dream is considered one of the main books on the interpretation of dreams and visions, via the Trend website. Seeing yourself eating grapes in a dream is full of visions that indicate kindness, blessing and support for the dreamer. Therefore, we have provided you, dear followers, with everything related to knowing the interpretation of sleep about the complete consumption of grapes in a dream for an ordinary, common, married or pregnant woman, as well as for men. Why do you dream of grapes for an ordinary woman? In detail, the interpreters explained in their books to us that seeing a girl in a dream about grapes indicates many things, including her upcoming future, that she will have a happy period when he comes to her, and his appearance. It is white grapes in a dream, full, that testify that God will give her a husband, and perhaps this husband will raise her. The presence of green grapes in a woman’s dream indicates that she will marry a rich man who has a lot of money and a prominent position. But if she sees herself in a dream full and she is eating grapes Red, it means that she will marry Dora and become her husband’s second wife, and God knows best. Why does a married woman dream of grapes? Interpretations say that it is undesirable to see grapes in a wife’s dream, especially if she does not marry him. Seeing grapes in a dream indicates problems with her husband and that she is suffering from discord in her marriage. It can spoil the relationship and interfere in it, and God knows best. It also indicates that seeing black grapes in a married woman’s dream symbolizes that she is a strong person and that she is the one who controls and controls the affairs of her home, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin also said that eating red grapes in a dream indicates complete On the husband’s love for her and his trust in her. As for eating whole green grapes in a dream, this indicates goodness and life in the near future. As for her eating grapes, the white color in the dream indicates that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. Why does Ibn Sirin dream of grapes? Ibn Sirin praises that seeing Grapes in a dream are a sign of the arrival of glaucoma and compassion. Ibn Sirin says that if one sees a whole vine in a dream, this means that the dreamer is going through a difficult time, and God knows best. Why does a pregnant woman dream of grapes? They say that if a pregnant woman sees herself picking grapes, this indicates the approaching The date of her birth, and eating whole grapes in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the end of her worries and the arrival of goodness and taste for her and for God. He knows best.If you have a dream and want it interpreted, leave it in the comments below and our team will get back to you.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dirty white dress in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a white dress: The white color is one of the colors that can be exposed to dirt more than other colors in clothes, and the dirt can be removed from it with difficulty, and this is what many women can suffer from, while clothes that contain white are very beautiful. I like them, the white color in a way General in everything that surrounds us, it has a special advantage compared to the rest of the existing colors. Interpretation of a dream about a white dress in a dream: We wear a lot of clothes that contain the color white in our lives, but we can suffer a lot from quick exposure to dirt, while Interpretation of a dream about a white dress in a dream: You can find this Many interpretations: In the interpretation of a white garment stained with mud, the man has fears and problems that he will face. It is also one of the signs of bad morals that the dreamer distinguishes. While washing dirty clothes in general, it is fatal to the vulva after the pain. When the butcher sees the clothes stained with blood, he shows its abundant strength, While clean white clothes escape his heavy loss. However, dirty clothes in an unmarried girl’s dream are one of the signs of her emotional failure. God also knows that the dirty white dress of unmarried women indicates her deficient qualities and lack of religious commitment. Washing a dirty white dress is evidence of... Her purity from the sins she committed. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a taxi in a dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream about wearing white clothing for a widow. There may be many customs and traditions in different countries in which white is worn upon the death of a husband or at a funeral, but they remain the customs of countries that differ from Other countries, and the dream of a widow wearing white came with: - Wearing white for a widow whose husband died is a sign of the abundance of goodness and the many benefits that she will receive. She is also a human being because of the many achievements and successes she has achieved in life. Whereas the widow when she gets engaged and wears The white dress, when she is sad, shows her fears and disappointment in her life. Also, seeing her wearing a white dress over her deceased husband showed that she loves and respects him. Also, her wearing the white dress for her deceased husband is evidence of her longing for him and her sadness over leaving him. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a person turning his back For me in a dream and its interpretations: A dream about wearing a white dress without a groom. Many girls dream of wearing a white dress and marrying the person of their heart, but...wearing a white dress without a groom can be considered one of the disturbing dreams for girls that came with these signs: A sign of a girl’s distraction and inability to make fateful decisions In her life. While she was wearing the white dress and walking alone from the news of her close marriage. While she was wearing white and was about to get married, it showed that she would hold a high position in her job. While the girl was wearing the white dress, and the presence of songs and dances, were signs of big problems in her life Many interpreters have interpreted that the white dress carries happy and sad omens, and these are the interpretations.

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a donkey in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq, and the interpretation of a dream about a donkey biting me

preview.html: Seeing a donkey in a dream is one of the dreams that express the appearance of something annoying to the dreamer that requires a lot of patience and perseverance, as the donkey is an animal that is characterized by patience and endurance. Or does it differ according to the social status of the viewer? Therefore, we will learn about all the interpretations related to this topic, the most famous of which were agreed upon by the great dream interpreters, including Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Shaheen, and others. An outlet for them. Whoever dreams that he hears the sound of a donkey, this is evidence that he will hear a lot of unpleasant and disturbing news. Riding a donkey in a dream is a sign for the dreamer that he will get rid of the stressful problems and difficult things that he suffers from in his life. Seeing the dreamer hitting a donkey in a dream means that the dreamer He will be exposed to many problems and will go through a period of intense sadness. Seeing a white donkey is a sign of achieving the goals that the dreamer seeks. While the dreamer sees that he is drinking donkey milk or eating their meat, this is evidence that he is abusing a person, and the vision warns him that the matter will stop. From He sees in a dream a group of donkeys running after him and trying to catch the pioneer, so the vision indicates that the dreamer is suffering from the problems facing him, but he must be patient so that he can overcome these circumstances. Seeing a donkey in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin narrated that seeing a donkey in a dream indicates On the many problems and exhausting responsibilities that the dreamer suffers from. As for someone who dreams that he is riding a donkey and feels a state of calm and joy, it symbolizes the dreamer gaining comfort, confidence, and everything he desires. While hearing the sound of a donkey or braying in a dream, this dream symbolizes the arrival of disturbing news. Extremely bad and bad that will sadden the dreamer. Whoever kicks a donkey in a dream is a sign of hearing unpleasant news. Seeing a donkey in a dream and it was jumping in the air or running, this dream is good news and evidence that the dreamer will get a lot of money. Whoever dreams that he Carrying a donkey, this vision symbolizes knowledge or money and may indicate a conflict between friends. While seeing a black donkey in a dream is a pleasant complexion and joy will come to the dreamer, because seeing a white donkey in a dream is a sign of a new job or trip. Dream interpretation of Imam al-SadiqImam al-Sadiq’s interpretation of seeing a donkey in a dream does not differ much from similar interpretations by other interpretation scholars, as he stated that seeing a fat donkey in a dream is much better than a weak and skinny donkey. While seeing a beautiful-shaped donkey in a dream is much better than an ugly donkey in a dream. An unmarried girl who sees a zebra in her dream and tries to approach him but he refuses, the vision shows that she will meet a very proud bachelor, so it is better for her to think about it before she starts this marriage, because it will be tiring on her. While a married woman sees herself in a dream and tries Riding a donkey but...

title: Interpretation of dreams to see my ex-fiancé’s mother in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-fiance’s mother in a dream. In the following lines, we will present the interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-fiance’s mother in a dream and other details that interest you. Interpretation of dreams about seeing my ex-fiance’s mother in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing my ex-fiance’s mother in a dream and strong relationships, and God is all-knowing if an unmarried girl sees The mother of her ex-fiancé in a dream, this may be evidence that she saw her in one of the situations, and God knows all the unseen. If a single girl sees the mother of her ex-fiancé and is angry, this may indicate trouble, and God knows the unseen. If she sees the mother of her ex-fiancé happy, this may lead to an improvement in her relationship With her fiancé, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about the death of my beloved father in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the death of my beloved’s father in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that seeing your lover’s father in a dream could be a sign of success in your relationship with your lover, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a single girl sees her lover’s father angry in a dream, it may be evidence that he is doing things that make people angry, and God knows the unseen. If she is seen working with her lover’s father, she may express her attempt to propose to her lover, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams for my ex-fiancé’s mother kissing me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for my ex-fiancée’s mother kissing me in a dream can lead to hearing words of mercy, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees her ex-lover’s mother hugging her This may indicate support for the girl from her lover’s mother, and God knows the unseen. When you see peace on the mother of your ex-lover in a dream, it may symbolize peace, God willing. If a single girl sees the mother of her ex-lover talking to her, this may indicate goodness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a sister My ex-fiancée is in our house in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-fiancée’s sister in our house in a dream that may portend goodness, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her ex-fiancé’s sister in her house in a dream, this may lead to a relationship, and God knows best. Just as an unmarried girl sees her lover’s sister in her house, it may express About her approaching marriage, and God knows the unseen. When she sees under the ex-lover in the dreamer’s house, it may indicate official contact, and God is Most High and Most Knowledgeable. Interpretation of the dream of seeing my ex-fiancé’s brother in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing my ex-fiancée’s brother in a dream could express his help for the girl to return to her fiancé, and God knows best. The unseen: If an unmarried girl sees her ex-fiancé’s brother in a dream, this may indicate helping him return to the brother, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her ex-fiancé’s sister in a dream, her fiancé’s family may remember her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing.
